CustomField.inlineHelpText: Navigational: Keywords that contain brand names signal navigational intent, meaning a searcher knows precisly where they’re headed. Informational: The searcher is willing to find out more about the concept. These could be good for developing “gated” content and collecting emails. Transactional: These queries can represent both the purpose to buy and read more about the concept. Commercial: This type can also be referred to as buy now or high intent. It signifies a strong intention on the part of the
CustomField.label: Content Intent
